document_api_meta.title: Get Affiliate Partner Campaign List
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API offers the ability to list campaigns created by the Affiliate Partner.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The partner access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 3. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3978f4c20311b8b555) to get partner access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: category_asset_cipher
request_query_param.desc: The partner identifier used in API requests. Retrieve this value by using the [Get Authorized Category Assets API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/666012dd609d4402cc3be995).

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The number of results to be returned per page. Default: 10. Valid range: [1-100].

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the `next_page_token` from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page. Maximum page size is `100` items.

request_query_param.name: status
request_query_param.desc:
The campaign status. The status is an enumerated type with values:
- `READY`
- `UPCOMING`
- `ONGOING`
- `CLOSED`
- `UNSPECIFIED`

request_query_param.name: type
request_query_param.desc:
The campaign type. This is an enumerated type with values: 
- MY_CAMPAIGNS
- GS_SELLING_CAMPAIGNS 
- SELLER_CAMPAIGNS
- EXCLUSIVE_TIKTOK_SHOP  
Default value is MY_CAMPAIGNS.

request_query_param.name: query_type_filter
request_query_param.desc:
An extended filter to be used when the campaign type property type is set to SELLER_CAMPAIGNS or EXCLUSIVE_TIKTOK_SHOP. 
If the type property is set to SELLER_CAMPAIGNS, the valid values for this property are: 
- MARKETPLACE: the response includes campaigns that the partner did not join.
- JOINED :  the response includes campaigns the partner has joined only.
If the type property is set to EXCLUSIVE_TIKTOK_SHOP, the valid values for this property are:
- AVAILABLE: the response includes campaigns the partner is permitted to join.
- JOINED: the response includes campaigns the partner has joined only.
Other types can either not pass a value or pass in Default.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc:
The campaign status. The status is an enumerated type with values:
- READY
- UPCOMING
- ONGOING
- CLOSED

response_param.name: ^^registration_start_time
response_param.desc: The scheduled start time in Unix epoch format for seller product registration. Note that this field can be updated when the campaign status is set to `READY` or `UPCOMING` only.

response_param.name: ^^registration_end_time
response_param.desc: The scheduled end time in Unix epoch time format for seller product registration. This field is no longer editable when the campaign status is set to `CLOSED`.

response_param.name: ^^campaign_start_time
response_param.desc: The scheduled start time in Unix epoch time format for the campaign. Note that this field can be updated when the campaign status is set to `READY` or `UPCOMING` only.

response_param.name: ^^campaign_end_time
response_param.desc: The scheduled end time in Unix epoch time format for the campaign. Note that the end time must be less than 360 days from the start date. This field is no longer editable when the campaign status is set to `CLOSED`.

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: The total number of campaigns in the list.

error_code_list.msg: nvalid parameter Creator and Seller, please ensure Region mismatch.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access a TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP) campaign information, including view campaign list and details and campaign product list and details.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP) campaign information, including your contact information, campaign list and details, and campaign product list and details.
